Add User body informations: This will create a user that will be able to manage this merchant. The user will receive an email with its credential to log in on this backoffice.
An email has been sent to {{email}} with: An email has been sent to {{email}} with the instructions to login.
Are you sure you want to delete the user: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{email}} ?
Are your sure to delete {{username}} use: Are your sure to delete {{username}} user permissions for {{store_name}} store ?

merchant.alert: Old users are deprecated. They are no longer used to connect to this new Merchant Back-Office. We recommend for security purpose that you delete all existing legacy users as soon as they exist in Identity except if you are using legacy user token to make API call or if you need to access to the old Merchant Back-Office.

operator.alert: This list shows all existing operator's legacy users. Operator's legacy users are now deprecated and no longer needed to log into this Operator Back-Office. We recommend for security purpose that you delete all existing operator’s legacy users as soon as they exist in Identity except if you are using the operator’s legacy user token to make API call.

merchant.alert: This list shows all merchant's existing legacy users. These users are needed to log into the old Merchant Back-Office. Upon logging into the new Merchant Back-Office, the merchant's user will be automatically migrated to the new user management system (Identity). We recommend for security purpose that you ask to your merchants to delete all existing merchant’s legacy users as soon as they exist in Identity and they don't use anymore old Merchant Back-Office.

Please confirm you want to give this use: Please confirm you want to give this user access to this merchant backoffice.
To add a user, please enter first his em: To add a user, please enter first his email address.
You will receive a mail with a summary o: You will receive a mail with a summary of the user credentials.
Your password must contain at least one: Your password must contain at least one number, one capital letter and one special character
